paragraph.emphasis:
Meristic Data for Adult
Hadogenes bicolor Purcell, 1899
,
H. longimanus Prendini, 2001
, and
H. newlandsi Prendini, 2001

tableNote.paragraph: Measurements follow Newlands and Prendini (1997) and Prendini (2001a , 2005b ).
a Measured from base of condyle to tip of fixed finger.
b Sum of metasomal segments I–V and telson.
